issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Cluster with N nodes and with running topologies. N new nodes join and the old machines start to be disconnected.
Some of the new nimbus fail with this message:

comments.body: Shared storage is being used for storm/stormData
